A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One of the best in the franchise. Better than 1-3\, Rogue 1\, and 7. Hard to compare to the original trilogy\, but definitely sets out to move the story forward instead of retreading everything before it again like Force Awakens.\n\nMaybe it is a little long. It certainly feels like it could have been a bit more efficient in the first half\, but when it gets going in the second half it lays a lead foot on the gas and doesn't let up.
